title: Crashing/Leaver
body: I don't think its fair if you  happen to crash, then you have a leaver. There's nothing you can do about it if you've crashed. So, why should you be punished for it?

replies.body: This just happened to me again. i haven't had an problems since before Kled was released, but now not even a full week later I get skipped straight back     to 20 minute timers because my game has been crashing again.
I had the same problem last night sent in a support ticket and still no reply which infuriates me since I can't even play a game as of now

Leaverbuster treats everyone equally regardless of intent, because it causes others a negative experience.  The best way to resolve this is by solving whatever is causing you to crash.  If you'd like to give me some more details of what's happening or error messages you're receiving, I'd be happy to help!
